name: header

charset.description:
The character encoding in which to encode the header value.

            For more information on character encodings, see:
            www.w3.org/International/O-charset.html.

statustext.description:
Text that explains the status code. This attribute is used in conjunction with the
	statusCode attribute.

statuscode.description: A number that sets the HTTP status code.

value.description: A value for the HTTP header. This attribute is used in conjunction with the name attribute.

description: Generates custom HTTP response headers to return to the client.
